greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A007302(n)-1.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Alma D'Aniello, Aldo de Luca, Alessandro De Luca, On Christoffel and standard words and their derivatives, arXiv:1602.03231 [cs.DM], 2016 (mentions this sequence).
mathematica: a[n_]:=Count[BitXor[b1=IntegerDigits[n, 2]; b3=IntegerDigits[3*n, 2]; PadLeft[b1, Length[b3]], b3], 1]; Table[a[n] - 1, {n, 1, 100}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 12 2017 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 11 2017
